tianPeng: The intelligent programming car produced by ELECFREAKS Co.ltd looks like a pig
tianPeng.ServoList: Select the servo on the S1 or S2
tianPeng.WheelList: Select the wheel on the left or right
tianPeng.closeLight: TODO: Turn off the eye mask lamp.
tianPeng.colorLight: TODO: Select a color to Set eye mask lamp.
tianPeng.disableServo: TODO: Set the angle of servo.
tianPeng.rgbLight: TODO: Set RGB color of eye mask lamp.
tianPeng.rgbLight|param|b: B color value of RGB color, eg: 236
tianPeng.rgbLight|param|g: G color value of RGB color, eg: 202
tianPeng.rgbLight|param|r: R color value of RGB color, eg: 83
tianPeng.setServo: TODO: Set the angle of servo.
tianPeng.setTravelTime: TODO: Setting the direction and time of travel.
tianPeng.setWheels: TODO: Set the speed of left and right wheels.
tianPeng.sonarReturn: TODO: Cars can extend the ultrasonic function to prevent collisions and other functions.
tianPeng.trackEvent: TODO: Runs when line sensor finds or loses.
tianPeng.trackLine: TODO: Judging the Current Status of Tracking Module.
tianPeng.trackLine|param|state: Four states of tracking module, eg: TrackingState.L_R_line
